title: S15 Ep78: The Martians: Evidence of Life with  Nick Redfern
itunes:title: The Martians: Evidence of Life with  Nick Redfern
description:
Darkness Radio visits the red planet, The Martians: Evidence of Life with guest Nick Redfern!
Listen Here Free:

Listen Ad Free Here:

Today Nick Redfern takes us on an in-depth look at the theory that Mars was once a world that teemed with life. Perhaps, even, life not too dissimilar to ours. Incredibly, the Martians may still be there. Alive.

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

Visit Nick's site here: https://bit.ly/332OPyv

Mars Face Hugger Picture: http://dailym.ai/2G7nTEz
